channel.title: [Member Items]How Do I Make Items Member Only?[Member Items]
channel.description:
Ok, i have another problem..xD im a problematic person or so it appears lol. Well i've been trying to get people to post on the site and everything but they wont REALY benifit from it too much, so they dont post.. so i thought perhaps i would make members only items.. but i dont know how to lol. I've tried one TuT but it made no sence to me and i cudn't follow it properly... so i'd like for someone to either help me out or add me on msn and help me on there..
[size=10pt][My Msn]JakeHalesOwen@Hotmail.com[My Msn] <== Dont add me for help with coding because im not good at it lol![/size]
Thanks
